metadata.description: Collection of Agent Skills for Clix.

plugins.name: clix-integration
plugins.description: Integrates Clix SDK into mobile projects

plugins.name: clix-event-tracking
plugins.description: Implements Clix event tracking (Clix.trackEvent) with naming and schema best practices

plugins.name: clix-user-management
plugins.description: Implements Clix user identification and user properties (setUserId, setUserProperty) with logout best practices and campaign-ready usage

plugins.name: clix-mcp-server
plugins.description: A Model Context Protocol server enabling AI agents to deliver real-time, trustworthy Clix documentation and SDK code examples. Provides documentation search with semantic ranking, SDK source code search across iOS/Android/Flutter/React Native, and CLI installation guides.
